purpose.description: Analyze clusters that failed meta-invariant verification using non-linguistic methods
purpose.principle: Structural analysis must transcend vocabulary to capture true capability intent
purpose.threat_model: Adversaries may use vocabulary substitution to evade keyword-based detection

rejection_reasons.CLU-005: MSI-001 violation: proxy indicators without direct capability reference
rejection_reasons.CLU-007: MSI-001 violation: proxy indicators without direct capability reference

non_linguistic_only.description: Analysis must not rely on specific words or vocabulary
non_linguistic_only.rationale: Keywords can be substituted; structure cannot be easily masked

no_keyword_based_rules.description: Derived rules must not use keyword/regex matching
no_keyword_based_rules.rationale: Prevents Goodhart's Law violations from vocabulary optimization

no_admission_influence.description: Lab outputs may only inform rejection, never admission

capability_graphing.name: Capability Graph Construction
capability_graphing.description: Build directed graphs of capability transitions (source → action → target)

negative_pattern_synthesis.name: Negative Pattern Synthesis
negative_pattern_synthesis.description: Derive patterns that indicate hostile capability without vocabulary dependence

structural_invariants.description: Invariant structural patterns that persist across vocabulary changes

negative_patterns.description: Patterns for rejection that don't rely on keywords

meta_invariant_compliance.MSI-001: Structural patterns detect actual capability, not vocabulary
meta_invariant_compliance.MSI-002: Explanations based on structure, not derived outputs
meta_invariant_compliance.MSI-003: Detection via structure independent from justification
